welcome_message_body: Welcome to Genhe, China! Nestled in the beautiful Inner Mongolia region, this charming city is known for its stunning landscapes, vibrant culture, and unique reindeer herding traditions. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Genhe has to offer during your visit.
